name: Snowmelt (Carrogath, Les, maneki_mushi)
description:
Winter is ending. While most are looking forward to the spring, one person is looking back: the spirit of Spring herself. Not only is her beloved Winter's life coming to an end, Spring will be expected to assume all of her responsibilities immediately afterward. But how will she be able to do that, when even Winter herself seems to be having her doubts? And with technology rapidly advancing by the day, is there even still room in this world for gods?

Snowmelt is a kinetic novel and features no choices. Playtime is around 15-20 minutes.

CREDITS:

Script/Programming: Carrogath
Character Art/CGs: maneki-mushi
Item Art/BGs/GUI: XLEHX
Music from ontama-m.com
